features: 🌹𝗥𝗘𝗝𝗨𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗘 & 𝗦𝗢𝗙𝗧𝗘𝗡 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡: Made from steam-distilled rose petals to preserve antioxidants, our rose water reduces the appearance of impurities, removes excess sebum, and calms redness. Added hyaluronic acid and aloe vera hydrate, leaving skin refreshed and radiant.
🌟𝟲 𝗚𝗟𝗢𝗪-𝗚𝗜𝗩𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗕𝗘𝗡𝗘𝗙𝗜𝗧𝗦: Our concentrated rose water toner boosts radiance, softens skin, freshens, soothes, calms redness, and hydrates.

🎖️ 𝗥𝗘𝗩𝗜𝗧𝗔𝗟𝗜𝗭𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗫𝗜𝗗𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 + 🍃 𝗛𝗬𝗗𝗥𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗢𝗘𝗦: Youth-boosting antioxidants found in rose petals calm the complexion, support collagen production & smooth the appearance of wrinkles. Super-hydrator hyaluronic acid, plus calming aloe vera, soothe the skin’s barrier and soften the complexion.

⚗️ 𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗔𝗠 𝗗𝗜𝗦𝗧𝗜𝗟𝗟𝗘𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗦𝗢𝗙𝗧𝗘𝗥 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡: Our rose water is high in antioxidants that protect and regenerate your skin. It's also rich in vitamin C + vitamin A, which help to boost collagen and brightness. We distill our rose water with steam in one extraction to retain valuable micronutrients for your skin.

🧑‍🔬 𝗗𝗘𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗦𝗧 𝗧𝗘𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗡 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡 𝗧𝗬𝗣𝗘𝗦 & 𝗧𝗢𝗡𝗘𝗦: Focusing on natural ingredients, we’ve created a dermatologist-backed vegan and cruelty-free rose water toner for all skin types and tones. Our toner is designed for sensitive skin and doesn’t contain any synthetic fragrances or colors.

🌼 𝗪𝗛𝗢 𝗪𝗘 𝗔𝗥𝗘: Welcome to the Eclat community! We create simple yet efficacious skincare that delivers proven results. We focus on clinically backed, recognizable ingredients that help you achieve your skincare goals and reveal the radiance within.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Hydro-Distilled 2 3-in-1 Formula 3 Your Routine

What skin types is this best for? Our rose water toner is suitable for all skin types, including more sensitive skin. We formulate with gentle ingredients to help soothe the visible signs of inflammation and keep skin calm. Is this scented? This toner has a light rose scent, created by the natural rose content within. We consciously formulate without synthetic, potentially drying fragrances. How often should I use this? We recommend using our toner twice a day – morning and night, after cleansing and before moisturizing. You can also use it once a day if you prefer. Do I need to store this in the refrigerator? No, you don’t need to refrigerate our toner – though some of our customer like to if they’re looking for an extra cooling, refreshing feel during application.

Nourish, Calm, and Hydrate Naturally rich in vitamins A and C, our rose water toner rejuvenates your skin and supports its barrier, unveiling a glowier and calmer complexion. We’re in the Press… Discover why our rejuvenating rose water toner has garnered a loyal following. Skin- and Nature-Kind Formula Not only is our rose water toner kind on all skin types, it’s also certified carbon neutral by ClimatePartner. That means that 100% of the carbon emissions of our serum’s production are offset. Wake Up Your Complexion Find out why our community loves our fragrant rose water toner for refreshing and hydrating skin without leaving it feeling weighed down, sticky, or “stripped”. Welcome to the Éclat Family Our rose water toner has delivered softer, dewier skin to people around the world. We can’t wait for you to experience its complexion-balancing benefits too! We Make Skincare Accessible Minimal markups, maximum glow-giving. We cut out the middleman.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I WAS AMAZED
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE:Buy this rosewater now. Make sure you use every single morning and night. I would have never believed the difference in my skin after continued use. The softness and smoothness to my skin feels unbelievable. I have heard of rosewater my entire life and had never even attempted to use. Well, I am a believer. I have been without rosewater and with rosewater and the difference is just something you will have to experience for yourself. I would have never thought it, but the three dark spots I have on my face are beginning to lighten significantly. The smoothness just blows me away. I plan to keep using regularly as part of my morn and night skincare routine. IT REALLY DOES MAKE A SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE. Also, don't waste your money buying a more expensive rosewater. The amount you receive and the benefits, cannot be compared to other brands. It is unbelievable how good Eclat products are. The price is wonderful and the products really do what they say they will do. Give it time and it will work for you. The key is to USE CONSISTENTLY.This product is unbelievably good. When I first received, I was shaking the liquid on a round cotton pad and just applying all over my face. For some reason, I was just ok with it. I read on Amazon where a lady said she just shook the liquid out in her hand and applied directly to the skin. I started doing that on the third of fourth time I used the product. The very first night I used like this, I was so amazed at how I felt. Doing this way made all the difference. My skin felt saturated with the product, felt refreshed and the softness, which came after it dried down, wow wow wow. So, I have been doing this for about 2 weeks or more and I can tell u, something has changed with my skin. This product is from Eclat, and I am also using their Vit C serum, Retinol serum & their anti-wrinkle face cream. My skin simply looks better. I was using the other products about a month before I started using the Rose Water Tonic. But this morn I took a mirror and got really up close to my face and yes, there wS a difference. To which of these products do I owe this to, well, I don't know. Maybe a combo of all of them. I really cannot say a bad thing about any of these products, but just the opposite. I will review them separately. The only thing I dislike about this company, so far, is that I ordered the Retinol cream to be applied at night, over the Retinol serum. I used one jar, loved it and wanted to order another. EXCEPT the pager where u would order the product, said that it was out of stock and didn't know when it would come back in stocks or if it would ever come back in stock. So, I do not want this to happen with a product if I am pleased and feel good about using it. SO, I WILL SAY I AM NOW HESITANT TO KEEP ORDERING WHAT I AM USING BECAUSE NEXT TIME, IT MAY BE ANOTHER PRODUCT I AM CRAZY ABOUT. Other than this, I love the Eclat products. I highly recommend the Rose Water Tonic and all the others I have listed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rose Water Toner
reviews.reviewText: I just love the smell of this rose water toner! Takes very little amount to apply. I pore it directly into my palm of my hand, and apply to my face. I am very pleased with this toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have aging skin and decided to add a toner to my skin care routine. I use the moisturizer from this brand. I love their products and the price point. I put this in a one ounce mini spray bottle and started using it after I wash my face in the morning and at night. After using it for one week my skin completely changed. Soft, glowing gorgeous!! I went to a doctor appointment and hadn’t seen the nurse in a couple of months. She complimented me on my weight loss (I haven’t lost weight!). When I laughed and said I wish!! She said she could see it in my face. Later I realized it wasn’t weight loss but my face looked different and this is the only change in my routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the rest
reviews.reviewText: I have bought and returned other rosewater products because they did not live up to the hype. This is the first and only one I can say makes my skin glow. Not sticky, fast absorbing, lovely natural rose scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First time purchase
reviews.reviewText: The scent is not overpowering, it does seem to make my skin a little softer. Not sure if I will repurchase or not, but it's a good product. I love the Eclat line.
Suave y sedoso perfecto para una limpieza profunda de los mejores que he probado olor encantador.

reviews.reviewText: It smells sooo nice and I love how it’s clean only products!! I use everyday

Utilisé tous les matins,j'ai constaté un très beau résultat.Ça rajeunit mesdames ,on me dit que je fais très bonne mine ....MAISJe l'ai acheté ici fin août 2022 pour 9,98€ le flacon de 200 mlEt aujourd'hui je suis choquée de voir qu'il coûte presque 60 € !!!

Wunderbar duftendes Rosenwasser. Direkt bei dem öffnen kam ein toller Duft raus. Sehr leichte Textur. Kein klebriges Gefühl auf der Haut. Nach der Reinigung auf der Haut nur ein paar Tropfen verteilen und schon hat man ein wunderbar frisches Hautgefühl. Gerne wieder.

Ho voluto testare questo prodotto perché si descrive come un tonico adatto ad ogni tipo di pelle e quindi adatto anche alle pelli miste/grasse come la mia. Tutti sappiamo che chi ha questo tipo di pelle ha purtroppo un eccesso di sebo e ovviamente pori dilatati, io ho anche qualche "cicatrice" da brufolo e qualche rossore, come potete vedere dalla prima foto del viso si notano le descrizioni soprastanti. Basta applicare qualche goccia sul un dischetto di cotone e passarlo delicatamente su tutto il viso evitando il contorno occhi. Si descrive come un ottimo astringente e seboregolatore. Io ho notato un grande cambiamento sotto questo aspetto, ma per quanto riguarda i rossori non tanto. Comunque credo sia diventata dipendente da questo tonico, perché ha un buonissimo profumo alle rose non invadente e poi ti lascia la pelle liscia, luminosa e fresca. Che dire... un MUST HAVE per la skincare routine.
